title: [PS3] Cabela's North American Adventures
description:
Cabela's North American Adventures gives players the opportunity to experience North America's greatest hunts in over twenty prime hunting locations across the continent. It introduces fresh touches that hunters will appreciate, including a custom gun builder that allows players the ability to create thousands of gun options with a variety of receivers, stocks, barrels, and scopes. The game also capitalizes on the popularity of hunting shows and online videos by adding a cameraman into gameplay - to get compelling footage, hunters need to be at their best! Also, for the first time in franchise history, up to four friends can hunt together online at once. Once the hunt is done, friends can share their scores through online leader boards for bragging rights.

* North America's Best: Travel from Mexico to Alaska for record trophies in the adventure of a lifetime!
* Star in a Hunting TV Show: A cameraman will film your exploits and at the end of your hunt, your actions will be captured in an episode of the show
* Cabela's goes online - a hunting game first! Test your hunting skills in 4 person online simultaneous multiplayer. Compete to bag the biggest trophies and claim bragging rights!
* Custom Gun Builder: Customize your firearm for each hunting adventure
* Game integrates real world details while focusing on stealth, marksmanship, and mastering a diverse set of hunting skill
